Author: mknzngcnb
Text: how long have you been in recovery? for me it took a few months as I have a messed up digestive system from laxative abuse and the constant fast binge restrict cycle.   it sucks and you’re gonna want to relapse because of it but it will go away with time especially if you’re not forcing food on yourself. i’ve found that finding a place you are comfortable at and slowly increasing as your stomach capacity and hunger grows is the best way to start recovery
